original_text: He of whom these things are said belonged to a different tribe, and no one from that tribe has ever served at the altar.
korean_text: 이것은 한 사람도 제단 일을 받들지 않는 다른 지파에 속한 자를 가리켜 말한 것이라

sentences.original_text: He of whom these things are said
and no one from that tribe
has ever served at the altar
